petty.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a petty problem, detail etc is small and unimportant
petty.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: unkind and caring too much about small unimportant things
petty.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: How can she be so petty?
petty.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a petty official is not important â€“ used especially when they use their power as if they were important
petty.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Some petty bureaucrat wanted all the documents in triplicate.
